title: Diagnose Classifier Router
description: Routes a failure log into restore/compile/test/run/publish diagnosis targets.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Log[Failure Log] --> Classify{classify_failure}
  Classify -->|restore| R[task.diagnose.restore_fail.v1]
  Classify -->|compile| C[task.diagnose.compile_fail.v1]
  Classify -->|test| T[task.diagnose.test_fail.v1]
  Classify -->|run| U[task.diagnose.run_fail.v1]
  Classify -->|publish| P[task.diagnose.publish_fail.v1]
  Classify -->|unknown| G[task.diagnose_build_fail_triage.generic.v1]
